医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
华大基因与哥伦比亚国家癌症研究所合作加强癌症检测和预防2023年10月2日，华大基因与哥伦比亚国家癌症研究所（INC或Instituto Nacional de Cancerologia）签署了谅解备忘录（MoU）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231006/BGI-Genomics-and-Colombian-National-Cancer-Institute-Collaborate-to-enhance-cancer-detection-and-prevention.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231006/BGI-Genomics-and-Colombian-National-Cancer-Institute-Collaborate-to-enhance-cancer-detection-and-prevention.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c95305aa-ded5-45cc-953c-220a7b8f3a32 Fri, 06 Oct 2023 12:55:00 -0400 BGI Genomics and Colombian National Cancer Institute Collaborate to enhance cancer detection and prevention
研究发现高等教育学生的抑郁和焦虑程度较高伦敦大学学院研究人员领导的一项新研究发现，与未接受高等教育的同龄人相比，在英国接受高等教育的年轻人患抑郁和焦虑的风险略有增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231006/Study-finds-higher-levels-of-depression-and-anxiety-among-higher-education-students.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231006/Study-finds-higher-levels-of-depression-and-anxiety-among-higher-education-students.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0cd508cc-c390-4b9a-816b-233bf718ac83 Fri, 06 Oct 2023 12:49:00 -0400 Study finds higher levels of depression and anxiety among higher education students
机器学习可以简化肺癌筛查过程伦敦大学学院和剑桥大学的研究人员开发了机器学习模型，以确定最简单的肺癌筛查方法，使个性化筛查又近了一步。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231006/Machine-learning-can-simplify-lung-cancer-screening-process.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231006/Machine-learning-can-simplify-lung-cancer-screening-process.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a114788a-ad10-46f1-ac89-5cb5d31dbd12 Fri, 06 Oct 2023 12:44:00 -0400 Machine learning can simplify lung cancer screening process
研究发现，急性呼吸道感染后，人们可能会经历“长期感冒”伦敦玛丽女王大学发表在《柳叶刀》的 EClinicalMedicine 上的一项新研究发现，人们在急性呼吸道感染且 COVID-19 检测呈阴性后可能会出现长期症状，即“长期感冒”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231006/People-may-experience-long-colds-after-acute-respiratory-infections-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231006/People-may-experience-long-colds-after-acute-respiratory-infections-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1ce3839e-064b-4826-9b11-a4ced79b2999 Fri, 06 Oct 2023 12:37:00 -0400 People may experience 'long colds' after acute respiratory infections, study finds
研究人员开发了治疗难治性癫痫的创新治疗方案柏林自由大学的神经科学家 Sonja Bröer 教授参与了治疗难治性癫痫的创新治疗方案的开发。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231006/Researchers-develop-innovative-treatment-option-for-therapy-pressive-epilepsy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231006/Researchers-develop-innovative-treatment-option-for-therapy-pressive-epilepsy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f35b684d-b8b6-4d07-8014-60a4735aed56 Fri, 06 Oct 2023 12:30:00 -0400 Researchers develop innovative treatment option for therapy-resistant epilepsy
生物纳米颗粒超快超灵敏定量测量新方法病毒这么微小的颗粒物能在短短5分钟内准确检测出来吗？大阪都立大学的科学家们说是的，他们用创新的方法对生物纳米颗粒进行超快、超灵敏的定量测量，为早期诊断多种疾病打开了大门。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231006/New-method-for-ultrafast-and-ultrasensitive-quantitative-measurement-of-biological-nanoarticles.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231006/New-method-for-ultrafast-and-ultrasensitive-quantitative-measurement-of-biological-nanoarticles.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c4a60c05-1d65-49f0-bc2f-bf383f56b9c8 Fri, 06 Oct 2023 12:23:00 -0400 New method for ultrafast and ultrasensitive quantitative measurement of biological nanoparticles
研究发现，育儿假可减少父亲因酗酒而住院的情况休育儿假的男性因饮酒而住院的风险显着降低。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231006/Parental-leave-reduces-alcohol-lated-hospitalizations-in-fathers-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231006/Parental-leave-reduces-alcohol-lated-hospitalizations-in-fathers-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=83499306-c28a-4150-afdc-e93b21e0ab6a Fri, 06 Oct 2023 12:15:00 -0400 Parental leave reduces alcohol-related hospitalizations in fathers, study finds
改变某些分子相互作用可能会产生治疗前列腺癌的新策略德克萨斯大学圣安东尼奥健康科学中心（UT Health San Antonio）梅斯癌症中心领导的研究发现，改变某些分子相互作用可能会产生治疗前列腺癌和相关疾病的新策略。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231006/Altering-certain-molecular-interactions-could-yield-new-strategies-for-treating-prostate-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231006/Altering-certain-molecular-interactions-could-yield-new-strategies-for-treating-prostate-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=94d4190c-9adb-4bf4-aff2-efc0487fd7bd Fri, 06 Oct 2023 12:08:00 -0400 Altering certain molecular interactions could yield new strategies for treating prostate cancer
专家警告前足球运动员未经证实的 CTE 诊断匹兹堡大学学院的研究人员报告说，与没有这些疾病的人相比，患有抑郁症、焦虑症或睡眠呼吸暂停等医疗和心理健康问题的前职业美国橄榄球运动员更有可能被未经证实的慢性创伤性脑病（CTE）诊断。今天，哈佛大学和范德比尔特大学医学中心的运动医学系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231006/Experts-caution-about-unverified-CTE-diagnoses-in-former-football-players.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231006/Experts-caution-about-unverified-CTE-diagnoses-in-former-football-players.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=63f37c95-6a2d-41f3-85e0-268042c078b3 Fri, 06 Oct 2023 11:59:00 -0400 Experts caution about unverified CTE diagnoses in former football players
肌肉减少症使糖尿病患者心血管死亡的风险增加一倍在德国汉堡举行的欧洲糖尿病研究协会 (EASD) 年会上（10 月 2 日至 6 日）公布的新研究表明，低肌肉质量与个体死于心血管疾病的风险增加两倍相关患有糖尿病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231006/Sarcopenia-doubles-risk-of-cardiovian-death-in-people-with-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231006/Sarcopenia-doubles-risk-of-cardioangio-death-in-people-with-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=07c9368a-6b1a-4e33-8225-cff8d0671ab0 Fri, 06 Oct 2023 11:55:00 -0400 Sarcopenia doubles risk of cardiovascular death in people with diabetes
